subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
Copa America (Soccer)
organizations: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
lead_paragraph: New York City F.C. tied the Chicago Fire, 2-2, a result that ended N.Y.C.F.C.’s four-game losing streak but extended its winless run to nine games.
